00038 #ifndef PLANE_POLYGON_H
00039 #define PLANE_POLYGON_H
00040 
00041 using namespace std;
00042 using namespace Eigen;
00043 
00044 
00048 class PlanePolygon{
00049 protected:
00051   vector<vector2d> normals2D; 
00053   vector<vector2d> edgeDir2D; 
00055   vector<double> edgeLengths; 
00057   vector<double> offsets2D;
00058 
00060   GrahamsScan grahamsScan;
00062   Matrix3d m, eigenVectors;
00064   Vector3d eigenValues;
00066   SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Matrix3d> solver;
00067 
00068 public:
00070   double numPoints;
00072   vector<vector2i> pixelLocs; 
00074   vector<vector3f> vertices; 
00076   vector<vector2f> vertices2D;
00077   // Plane equation: for points p on the plane, (p-p0).dot(normal) = 0 or p.dot(normal) + offset = 0
00079   vector3f normal; 
00081   vector3f p0; 
00083   double offset;
00085   vector3f b1, b2; 
00086 
00087   
00089   double sum_xx, sum_yy, sum_zz, sum_xy, sum_xz, sum_yz;
00091   float width, height;
00093   vector2f min2D, max2D;
00095   vector3f corners[4];
00096   
00098   bool validPolygon;
00099   
00101   double conditionNumber;
00102   
00103 protected:
00105   bool constructConvexPoly(vector<vector3f>& points);
00107   bool computePlaneParameters(vector<vector3f>& points);
00108   
00109 public:
00111   PlanePolygon();
00113   PlanePolygon(vector< vector3f > points);
00115   PlanePolygon(vector<vector3f> points, vector<vector2i> _pixelLocs);
00117   ~PlanePolygon();
00118   
00120   double distFromPlane(vector3f p);
00122   vector3f rayFromPlane(vector3f p);
00124   vector2f projectOnto (const vector3f& p) const {return vector2f(b1.dot(p-p0), b2.dot(p-p0));} 
00126   bool liesAlongside(const vector3f& p) const;
00128   void merge(PlanePolygon& poly2);
00130   void merge(vector< PlanePolygon >& polygons);
00132   void transform(vector3f translation, Quaternionf rotation);
00134   void transform(const GVector::matrix3d< float >& M);
00136   vector3f intersect(vector3f l0, vector3f l);
00137 };

00139 #endif //PLANE_POLYGON_H
